aboutus: Blueway Trading Company (BTC) is a partnership firm formed in the year 2023. The managing partners of our company are Mr. K.J. Dilip Kumar (Retd. Manager, SBI) who is handling the finance department and its operation, Mr. Rijul Manesh Joseph.K (Chartered Engineer) is taking care of the business development and strategies and he is currently acting as Business Development Head. Team BTC is based with their head office and operations from Calicut, Kerala. As an emerging Trading company primarily, we are into domestic and international trading of Agri-products like Coconut, Tender coconut, variety of vegetables and fruits. We are committed to sourcing and supplying with utmost care in quality and goodness of the products. Our purchase team is based in different locations in India with their expertise in material selection. We also have a direct purchase system from the farmers with assured product quality & grade. Our aim is to emerge as a market leader in the Agri trading sector by 2026 and to expand our presence in the international markets with our own cultivated natural products.
